title: How do I change the size of the in-game shop?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
[FIXED]



Hello,

My mac just broke down, and I'm playing on my macbook until my iMac is repaired.
Now the problem is, the shop is too big for my screen.
How can I resize it to make it fit my screen?
If anyone know, I'd be happy to hear it!
Thank you :)

Saido {{champion:22}}

replies.body: Rineyy's advice is what I was going to suggest.  :D  The shop menu is resizable!  All you have to do is mouse over the bottom right corner, hold, and drag to a size that's comfortable for you.  Hope that helps!
Click and hold the bottom right corner of the shop and drag it to the left.
Well that's the problem. I can't drag the shop far enough in the screen to touch the bottom right corner of the shop..
You may first need to change your in-game resolution via the video settings.  If you still can't reach it, changing your monitor resolution outside of game as well should get this fixed up.
I will give this a try. Thank you!

If changing the resolution temporarily does not help you, you can manually edit the dimensions from your config files. I've outlined the process in this post; http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/cA0Kx43y-size-of-the-in-game-shop?comment=0000
I got it to work thanks to Porocles's tip. Thank you all for helping out! :)
